'''''"All is Well"''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the {{Quest|Hereafter: Return to the Mountains}} to restore [[Pervases' Temple]].

==Trivia==
* The last two letters of the Chinese title of this achievement are the same characters used in the latter half of [[Wang Ping'an]]'s name.
